resources.string:
EZlife – Customers services center offers information quickly, accurately, and efficiently with dedicated, professional, and modern serving style. 

	- Serving all customers over the territory of Vietnam 
	- Serving 24h/7 a week, including weekends and Tet Holidays 
	- Provide utilities: 
		• Guide procedures, support customers easily search for information, freedom of choice of products and services on demand; 
		• Provide information about products and services, the latest preferential policy; 
		• Transact anywhere, anytime, saving time and transaction costs; 
		• Receive and resolve any problems and customers complaints; 
		• Private Policy. 

Contact us: 

_____________________________ 
Customers care services EZlife 
	• Tel / Fax: (08) 371 54 714 
	• Hotline: 090 367 4040 
	• Email: info@ezlife.com.vn 
	• Website: www.easylife.com.vn/ www.ezlife.com.vn

Personal Information Protection Policies 

	EZlife understands that customers pay more attention to personal information that you trust us to provide for the security and how we use the information. EasyLife appreciates the trust and commitment that the information will be protected by our best effort. 

	EZLife makes sure that we will use the customer information are reasonable and considerable in order to always improve the quality of services and giving our customers the exciting experience when using our services. 

Collecting customer information 

	To use the services of EZLife, customers have to register and provide certain information such as email, name, phone number and address and some other information. The registration procedure helps us determine the provision for members use all application’s utilities. You can choose not to provide us with certain information, but then you will not be able to enjoy some utilities which our feature application offers. 

	We also store any information you enter into the website or sent to EZlife. The information will be used for feedback request of customers, for giving appropriate suggestions for each customer while shopping at EZlife, for improving the quality of goods and services and contact with you when necessary. 

	In addition, the transaction information includes purchase history, transaction value, shipping method and payment also be archived by EZlife to solve problems that may arise later on. 

Use of Information 

	The purpose of collecting information makes a contribution to EZlife, thus we can bring utilities benefits as much as possible to customers. Therefore, the information will be used for the following activities: 

	- Send newsletters introducing new products and promotions of EZlife. 

	- Provide some utilities, support customer service. 

	- Improve the quality of customer service EZlife. 

	- Solve problem, arising dispute regarding the use of software and services. 

	- Prevent the illegal activities in Vietnam. 

Information Sharing 

EZLife known that customer information is an essential part in business working, and thus the information will not be sold, exchanged for any third party. We will not be share the customer information except for these particular cases following: 

	- In order to protect EZlife and all other third parties, we just give the information about account and other individual information when we do believe that providing the information is suitable with legality, with protection of interest, properties of those who use EZlife services and also other third parties. 

	- Following a legal request from government departments or we believe that this action is necessary and appropriate with legal request. 

	- In another cases, we will make a specific announcement to customer when it is necessary to provide the information to the third party and it is only provided when customer feedback is an acceptance. For example: promotion programs which has cooperation, sponsor with other EZlife’s partners; providing the necessary shipping information for transportation partners. 

It certainly does not include selling, sharing information that leads to reveal individual information of customer for commercial purposes which break the rules put in Personal Information Protection Policies of EZlife. 

Changing and removing the information account 

	You can change or update your account information any time. Although, you yourself remove all the information we can recover the information from our data base to resolve conflicts, carry out people using agreements, or for technology request, legality request related to the safety and actions of our website. 

Customer Information Security 

	An important thing for the customer is that do protect yourself before approaching password information when you use same computer with other people. Then, you must make sure that you had signed out the account when using our services. 

	EZlife emphasizes that we do concern the customer’s interest in protecting personal information. Thus, if you have any suggestion, or question regarding our security policies, please feel free to contact: 

	Tel/Fax: (08) 371 54 714 

	Email: info@ezlife.com.vn 

	Notes: Personal Information Protection Policies of EZlife are just applied at EZLife’s website. It does not include or relate to other third parties who order advertising or affiliate with EZLife.

SERVICES ARTICLES OF EZLIFE 

	Software applications EZlife is an asset of Covisolf Company Vietnam. Using the above information and products in EZlife also means you agree with following articles. 

	Read carefully the articles following. 

Register and log in using the account: 

	For using any service of EZlife, customers have to register account and provide some information such as email, full name, phone numbers and address, and other information. The purpose of this registration procedure helps us confirm the information providing for members to use all utilities application. 

	We also store any information you enter into the website or sent to EZlife. The information will be used for feedback request of customers, for giving appropriate suggestions for each customer while shopping at EZlife, for improving the quality of goods and services and contact with you when necessary. 

	In addition, the transaction information includes purchase history, transaction value, shipping method and payment also be archived by EZlife to solve problems that may arise later on. 

Rights of collection and use information 

	The purpose of collecting information makes a contribution to EZlife, thus we can bring utilities benefits as much as possible to customers. Therefore, the information will be used for the following activities: 

	- Provide some utilities, support customer service. 

	- Improve the quality of customer service EZlife. 

	- Solve problem, arising dispute regarding the use of software and services. 

	- Prevent the illegal activities in Vietnam. 

Information security: 

EasyLife known that customer information is an essential part in business working, and thus the information will not be sold, exchanged for any third party. We will not be share the customer information except for these particular cases following: 

	- We just give the information about account and other individual information when we do believe that providing the information is suitable with legality, with protection of interest, properties of those who use EZlife services and also other third parties. 

	- Following a legal request from government departments or we believe that this action is necessary and appropriate with legal request. 

	- In another cases, we will make a specific announcement to customer when it is necessary to provide the information to the third party and it is only provided when customer feedback is an acceptance. For example: promotion programs which has cooperation, sponsor with other EZlife’s partners; providing the necessary shipping information for transportation partners. 

	It certainly does not include selling, sharing information that leads to reveal individual information of customer for commercial purposes which break the rules put in Personal Information Protection Policies of EZlife. 

Commitment to use 

	You agree to use EZlife products in certain extent with all applicable laws and regulations, not to send up, transmitted, distributed, linking content: 

	- Containing advertising information 

	- Violations of laws and regulations of the Government of Vietnam 

	- Violation of the provisions of trademark rights, intellectual property, personal property rights. 

	- Contains information that are obscene, offensive, defamatory left to sell ... or moral standards of society in any form, including the transmission or encourage activities which could constitute a crime violation or breach of any provision of this local law, national or international 

	- Damage safety and uniformity of the product 

	Any violation of the above provisions, EZlife will cancel your account and use rights of the offender. At the same time, depending on the severity of the violation, the violator will be responsible before the law. 

Rules of the action are not allowed: 

	- You must not allow violate, intrusion, access, use or seek to infringement, intrusion, get access or use any part of our server, and/or any data areas if we do not allow. 

	- You must not allow to send the information about pornography, offensiveness, defamatory left to sell ... or moral standards of society in any form, including the transmission or encourage behaviors can configure a crime or violation of any provision of this local law, national or international. 

	- You must not post or transmit any message which brings the advertisement, invitation, chain letters, investment opportunities, or any form of contact with any commercial purpose without the user's wishes, spam or spam messages. 

	- You do not send any information that contains any viruses, Trojans, bugs or other harmful components. 

	- You must not use the information contained in this website to any kind or any other purpose, unless the terms established by this Regulation shall be used. Disclaimer 

	EZlife has security measures for applications and services. However, we can not guarantee absolutely site from vandalism or viruses from the Internet and other programs. 

	There is no warranty or declaration about the accuracy or completeness of any information on this product. In any case, EZlife will not be liable for any loss, damage, liability brought by the use of information from this application, as well as any error, omission, interruption or delay of information. 

	The information used in this application is entirely dependent on the individual risk of the users. In any case, EZlife or its representatives will not be liable for any damages direct, indirect, incidental, special or any inevitable. 

	Application EZlife include links to other websites not owned or controlled by EZlife or contain information provided by third party suppliers. Therefore, EZlife does not responsible for errors or omissions in the information content and citations, privacy, security of web pages that link to and damages if you have access, use of such sites. 

Update, change: 

	We totally have the right to add, modify or delete any information and interface changes, presentation, composition or function, the content of this page application includes any item on at any time without prior notice. 

Changing the rules 

	We have the right to change the rules without prior notice. With continued use after amendment EZlife, you implicitly agree to abide by the amended regulations. 

Information of third parties 

	Information provided in EZlife may contain information from third parties or culled from other sources. We do not accept any responsibility for the information we post, you will use or trust in that information with understanding, responsibility and risk for your own. 

Intellectual property rights and other rights 

	All intellectual property rights exist in the application belongs to EZlife Covisolf Company Vietnam (Co Viet). Accordingly, all legal rights are guaranteed. Unless EZlife agrees, you are not allowed to upload, post, publish, reproduce, transmit or distribute in any way any component of any product or creating revisions application of the content, products EZlife. 

	In areas allowed for posting messages, you can share information permitted under our default format and you are solely responsible for the content, information, images, and any your share with any other individual users or groups of users. 

	However, in any case, we still reserve the right to handle the information published in accordance with the habits and customs, rules and ethical rules to ensure national security, and we reserves the right to allow or not allow your article to appear or exist on the forum or in the area of information sharing. 

	We have full rights, including copyright, trademark, trade secret and other proprietary rights, EZlife product content, and goods and services that we offer in EZlife. 

	The use of property rights and we need to get our prior written permission. In addition to a written authorization, we does not license in any other form whether it is a form of publication or implied, or by using the service to you. And therefore, you have no right to use application, website or our services to commercial purposes without the written permission of us before. 

Application law: 

	You agree that the Terms of Use and any dispute arising out from using this website or our products and services will be solved according to the current laws of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam. Through the registration or use of the site and our services, you implicitly agree to and comply with all laws and regulations of Vietnam.
Using this username for EZLife account.\nWe will bring to you full service on EZLife system with your account.
This information will help EZLife serve for you better.
